urls.title: Jagex - Character Artist
urls.description: Overview We have welcomed over 285 million players to RuneScape’s world of enthralling fantasy and, together with our team of passionate game creators, our community helps to shape how our games evolve. From casting votes on future game content, to interacting with the studio teams in live streams and in chat, we also join in person at our celebrated fan convention, RuneFest. Together with our players, we are a united Jagex tribe. Together we are building deep and engaging multiplayer gaming experiences for players everywhere. How you can contribute This is a fantastic opportunity for a Character Artist looking for a varied and challenging role that encourages creative input, teamwork, and personal development. The successful applicant will join an experienced team of artists, working on our flagship PC and soon to be Mobile title RuneScape. You will be responsible for creating a wide variety of character assets to fit into RuneScape’s medieval fantastical world. You wi
